item.title: Help me please. :o (NEED NEW COMPILER CODE)
item.dc:creator: @range_ftw101 range ftw101
item.description:
@range_ftw101 wrote:

I was wondering if anyone could help me by telling me why my compiler wont compile, if u know please answer this question below! it always says “the system cannot find the path specified =/ it currently is: @echo off
@TITLE Clawz Pkz Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in (”%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You Havent Downloaded Java :P…
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

if you could give me a new one that would be great!

             Thanks!, range ftw101

Read full topic
